nodes.text: A spear was a shaft with a blade placed on the top, a melee weapon typically used by primitive species like the Aeosians, Talz, Poletecs, and Ewoks.

The Elite Praetorian Guard of the First Order wielded advanced spear-like weapons like the electro-bisento and the vibro-arbir blade. Captain Phasma also wielded a baton that resembled a spear when unfurled.
